member.name: T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits
member.summary: Represents a set of constraints to apply when loading PKCS#12/PFX contents.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with default values.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by copying the values from another instance.
member.param: The instance to copy the values from.
member.exception: is .

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.MakeReadOnly
member.summary: Makes the instance read-only.

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.DangerousNoLimits
member.summary: Gets a shared reference to loader limits that indicate no filtering or restrictions of the contents should be applied before sending them to the underlying system loader.
member.returns: A shared reference to loader limits that indicate no filtering or restrictions of the contents should be applied before sending them to the underlying system loader.

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.Defaults
member.summary: Gets a shared reference to the default loader limits.
member.returns: A shared reference to the default loader limits.

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.IgnoreEncryptedAuthSafes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore encrypted authentication safes.
member.returns: to skip over encrypted PFX AuthSafe values; to decrypt encrypted PFX AuthSafe values to process their contents. The default is .

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.IgnorePrivateKeys
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore private keys.

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.IndividualKdfIterationLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the iteration limit for the individual Key Derivation Function (KDF) calculations.
member.returns: The iteration limit for the individual Key Derivation Function (KDF) calculations, or for no limit.

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the instance is read-only.
member.returns: if the instance is read-only; otherwise, .

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.MacIterationLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the iteration limit for the MAC calculation.
member.returns: The iteration limit for the MAC calculation, or for no limit.

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.MaxCertificates
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of certificates permitted.
member.returns: The maximum number of certificates permitted, or for no maximum.

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.MaxKeys
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of keys permitted.
member.returns: The maximum number of keys permitted, or for no maximum.

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.PreserveCertificateAlias
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to preserve the certificate alias, also known as the friendly name.
member.returns: to respect the alias for a certificate; to ignore the alias information. The default is .

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.PreserveKeyName
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to preserve the key name.
member.returns: to respect the key name identifier for a private key; to ignore the key name information and use a randomly generated identifier. The default is .

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.PreserveStorageProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to preserve the storage provider.
member.returns: to respect the storage provider identifier for a private key; to ignore the storage provider information and use the system defaults. The default is .

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.PreserveUnknownAttributes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to preserve unknown attributes.
member.returns: to keep any attributes of a certificate or private key that are not described by another property on this type intact when invoking the system PKCS#12/PFX loader; to remove the unknown attributes prior to invoking the system loader. The default is .

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits.TotalKdfIterationLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the total iteration limit for the Key Derivation Function (KDF) calculations.
member.returns: The total iteration limit for the Key Derivation Function (KDF) calculations, or for no limit.

member.name: T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoadLimitExceededException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when importing a PKCS#12/PFX has failed due to violating a specified limit.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoadLimitExceededException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the property representing the limit that was exceeded.

member.name: T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateLoader
member.summary: Provides methods for loading an X.509 certificate or a PKCS#12 PFX that contains certificates.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateLoader.LoadCertificate(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Loads a single X.509 certificate from , in either the PEM or DER encoding.
member.param: The data to load.
member.exception: is .
The data did not load as a valid X.509 certificate.
member.returns: The certificate loaded from .

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateLoader.LoadCertificate(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Loads a single X.509 certificate from , in either the PEM or DER encoding.
member.param: The data to load.
member.exception: The data did not load as a valid X.509 certificate.
member.returns: The certificate loaded from .

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateLoader.LoadCertificateFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a single X.509 certificate (in either the PEM or DER encoding) from the specified file.
member.param: The path of the file to open.
member.exception: is .
The data did not load as a valid X.509 certificate.
An error occurred while loading the specified file.
member.returns: The loaded certificate.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateLoader.LoadPkcs12(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Pkcs12LoaderLimits)
member.summary: Loads the provided data as a PKCS#12 PFX and extracts a certificate.
member.param: The data to load.
The password to decrypt the contents of the PFX.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control where and how to import the private key associated with the returned certificate.
Limits to apply when loading the PFX. A value, the default, is equivalent to .
member.exception: is .
contains a value, or combination of values, that is not valid.
contains a value that is not valid for the current platform.
The PKCS#12/PFX violated one or more constraints of .
An error occurred while loading the PKCS#12/PFX.
member.returns: The loaded certificate.
